metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart recites verses of a prayer to Shar as she draws closer to Nightsong.This is a prayer that SH may have recited previously, now repeated as SH gets past the final hurdles to fulfill Shar's bidding. Urging herself on for the 'final lap'.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Descent down the floating rocks in the Shadowfell

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Just a little bit farther. See my actions, Lady Shar. Hear my words of faith.
0.context: NodeContext: Urging herself on. Final descent

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar as she progresses downwards to her final goal

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: Nearly there... have to keep going...
2.context: NodeContext: Brief pause in prayer to urge herself on.

3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar as she progresses downwards to her final goal

4.speaker: Shadowheart
4.text: Lady Shar's will shall be done. As sure as night will fall.
4.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar as she progresses downwards to her final goal

5.speaker: Shadowheart
5.text: Cloak me in your shadow. Guide me to your victory.
5.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar as she progresses downwards to her final goal

6.speaker: Shadowheart
6.text: I have emptied my hearts of falsehoods.
6.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar as she progresses downwards to her final goal
